title: The Wrong Suitcase
description: A traveler takes the wrong bag at the airport and finds something strange inside.

title: The Unlocked Phone
description: Someone finds a phone on a park bench. It rings. Do they answer?

title: The Silent Passenger
description: A taxi driver picks up a customer who refuses to say a single word.

title: The Wrong Text Message
description: Receiving a text meant for someone else that reveals a secret.

title: The Letter from 1990
description: A letter arrives in the mail today, but it was sent 30 years ago.

title: The Empty House
description: A character returns home to find their furniture has been rearranged, but nothing was stolen.

title: The Midnight Gardener
description: You notice your neighbor digging a hole in their garden at 3 AM during a storm.

title: The Extra Key
description: You find a key on your keychain that you don't recognize, and it doesn't fit any of your locks.

title: The Forgotten Car
description: A luxury car has been parked on your street for six months without moving. Today, the trunk is open.

title: The Noise Upstairs
description: You live on the top floor of an apartment building, but you hear footsteps on the roof every night.

title: The Dinner Bill
description: A group of friends argues over how to split a complicated restaurant bill.

title: The Lie
description: A small lie that spirals out of control during a dinner party.

title: The Boss
description: A strict boss suddenly acts very kind. The employees are suspicious.

title: The Wedding Guest
description: A stranger arrives at a small wedding. Both the bride and groom think the other person invited them.

title: The Reunion
description: At a high school reunion, everyone remembers a specific student who never actually existed.

title: The Perfect Couple
description: You have dinner with the 'perfect couple', but under the table, you see one of them holding a knife.

title: The Lottery Ticket
description: Two friends buy a ticket together, but one holds onto it. It wins.

title: The Good Deed
description: You return a lost wallet with all the cash inside, but the owner accuses you of stealing a credit card.

title: The Promotion
description: You get a massive promotion, but you have to fire your best friend to take the role.

title: The Witness
description: You see a hit-and-run accident. The driver who drove away is your spouse.

title: The Hitchhiker
description: Picking up a stranger on the highway.

title: The Last Train
description: You fall asleep on the train and wake up at the final station. The station is abandoned and the doors won't open.

title: The Airbnb Host
description: You rent a room, but the host knows intimate details about your life that you never told them.

title: The Detour
description: A GPS detour takes you through a small village where everyone stops and stares at your car.

title: The Minimalist
description: A story about a man who sold everything to live with only 50 items.

title: The Imposter
description: A successful surgeon suddenly forgets how to hold a scalpel in the middle of an operation.

title: The Lost Password
description: A friend gives you an old hard drive with 100 Bitcoin, but they forgot the password.

title: The Ghost Match
description: A dating app matches you with someone who went missing 5 years ago.

title: The Group Chat
description: You accidentally send a complaining message about your boss to the company group chat.

title: The Influencer
description: A famous influencer's life looks perfect online, but a fan sees the sad reality through a window.

title: The Smart Home
description: A smart home system locks the doors and refuses to let the owner leave until they eat their vegetables.

title: The Photobomb
description: You take a selfie alone in your apartment. In the background of the photo, someone is standing behind you.

title: The Deepfake
description: You receive a video call from your mother asking for money, but your mother is sitting right next to you.

title: The Search History
description: You buy a used laptop and find a search history that describes a planned murder.

title: The Elevator
description: Getting stuck in an elevator for 4 hours with your ex-partner.

title: The Whisper
description: At a loud party, someone whispers a secret in your ear. You turn around, but no one is there.

title: The Open Mic
description: A comedian starts telling a story about a crime on stage. You realize he is describing something you did.

title: The Package
description: A drone delivers a package to your balcony. It contains a timer counting down.

title: The GPS
description: Your GPS leads you to an empty field and says 'You have arrived.' Then the car locks.

title: The Cafe Plot
description: You overhear two men at a cafe planning a crime. They look at you.

title: The 3 PM Signal
description: Every day at exactly 3:00 PM, a black car honks outside your house, but no one is inside.

title: The Statue Man
description: A man sitting on a park bench hasn't moved for 24 hours. People start to worry.

title: The Briefcase
description: A man leaves a briefcase on the subway. You run to give it back, but he looks terrified and runs away.

title: The Inheritance
description: You inherit a mansion, but you only keep it if you spend one night in the basement.

title: The Free Warning
description: A stranger pays for your coffee and leaves a note that says: 'Don't go home tonight.'

title: The Prediction
description: You find a diary in a used bookstore that describes your day tomorrow.

title: The Swap
description: A billionaire offers you 10 million dollars for 5 years of your life. You wake up 5 years older instantly.

title: The Yes Man
description: A character decides to say 'Yes' to every request for 24 hours.

title: Van Life
description: A couple sells their house to live in a van, but the reality is much dirtier than Instagram.

title: The Digital Detox
description: A group of friends goes to a cabin without phones. They realize they have nothing to say to each other.

title: The Shadow Friend
description: A lonely man meets a new friend who does all the illegal things the man secretly wants to do.

title: The Shared Dream
description: A character discovers that everyone in their small town had the exact same dream last night.

title: The Forgotten Room
description: A woman discovers a door in her childhood home that her parents swear does not exist.

title: The Mask
description: A polite man realizes he cannot take his 'work smile' off his face. It is stuck.

title: Synchronicity
description: A specific number appears everywhere (clock, bus, receipt) until the character follows it.

title: The Narrator
description: A man hears a voice narrating his life, but the narrator starts lying to him.

title: The Invisible Man
description: After losing his job and status, a man realizes people literally cannot see him anymore.

title: The Projection
description: A woman hates her new colleague intensely, until she realizes the colleague is an exact copy of herself.

title: The Recurring Stranger
description: A figure from your recurring nightmare suddenly walks into your office in real life.

title: The Loop
description: A character repeats the same argument with their partner every day until they find the 'root' word.

title: The Child
description: A successful CEO meets a child in the park who knows secrets only the CEO knew at age 5.

title: The Glass Wall
description: A man can see the life he wants, but an invisible wall blocks him. He realizes he built the wall himself.

title: The Critic's Theater
description: A musician performs on stage, but the only people in the audience are the negative voices in his head.

title: The Waiting Room
description: A room full of people waiting for 'the perfect moment' to start their lives. One man decides to leave.

title: The Heavy Backpack
description: A hiker carries a backpack that gets heavier every time he holds a grudge. He must empty it to survive the mountain.

title: The Unfinished Symphony
description: An artist enters a museum filled with beautiful but unfinished works. He realizes perfectionism is a graveyard.

title: The Lucky Coin
description: A man finds a coin he thinks gives him luck. He becomes successful, then loses the coin. Does the success stop?

title: The Script
description: A man finds a physical script of his life in his mailbox. He is shocked to see he is just a background character, so he starts improvising.

title: The Two Wolves
description: A literal interpretation where a man is followed by two dogsâ€”one angry, one calm. They grow or shrink based on his thoughts.

title: The Future Self
description: You meet yourself from 10 years in the future. They look at you with disappointment. You have 10 minutes to ask why.

title: The Second Arrow
description: A samurai teaches a student that the first arrow (pain) is inevitable, but the student keeps stabbing himself with the second arrow (suffering).

title: The Empty Office
description: You arrive at work on Monday, but your office is completely empty. Everyone else is working as normal.

title: The NDA
description: You are offered a job with a salary of 1 million a year. The only rule: you can never tell anyone what you do.

title: The Night Shift
description: A security guard watches the monitors of an empty building. One night, a monitor shows a party happening in the basement.

title: The Ghost Employee
description: Payroll keeps sending checks to an employee named 'John Doe', but nobody in the office has ever seen him.

title: The Glass Ceiling
description: A woman discovers that the floor above her office, where the executives work, doesn't actually exist on the building plans.

title: The Hidden Camera
description: You find a hidden camera in your living room. It's connected to your own laptop.

title: The Neighbor's Dog
description: The neighbor's dog barks at everyone except the mailman. One day, the mailman enters the house and doesn't come out.

title: The Attic
description: You hear a phone vibrating in your attic. You don't own a phone that vibrates.

title: The Grocery List
description: You find a grocery list in your pocket written in your handwriting, but for items you are allergic to.

title: The Last Bus
description: You take the night bus. It drives past your stop, leaves the city, and keeps driving into the darkness.

title: Apartment 404
description: The elevator has a button for the 4th floor, but the building only has 3 floors. One day, you press it.

title: The Smiling Woman
description: A woman on the street smiles at you. You walk 5 blocks, turn a corner, and she is there smiling again.

title: The Payphone
description: An old payphone on a deserted street rings. A voice says, 'They know what you did.'

title: The Infinite Library
description: You enter a library where every book contains a different version of your life.

title: The Color Blue
description: One morning, the color blue disappears from the world. No one notices except you.

title: The Stop Watch
description: You buy a stopwatch. When you press pause, the entire world freezes, except for you.

title: The Mirror
description: You look in the mirror, but your reflection blinks one second later than you do.

title: The Stranger in the Photo
description: You look at your childhood family photos and see a stranger standing in the background of every single picture.

title: The Forgotten Language
description: You wake up speaking a language you never learned, but you can't speak your native tongue anymore.

title: The Diary Entry
description: You find a diary entry from yesterday written in your handwriting. You have no memory of writing it.

title: The Name Tag
description: You arrive at a conference. Everyone is wearing a name tag with your name on it.

title: The False Memory
description: You and your sibling have the exact same vivid childhood memory, but it could only have happened to one of you.

title: The Unsubscribed
description: You try to unsubscribe from a spam email. The computer screen replies: 'You can never leave.'

title: The Rating
description: You discover a hidden app on your phone that shows your 'social rating' score. It is dropping fast.

title: The Notification
description: Your phone buzzes with a notification: 'Run.' You look up and see everyone else looking at their phones in terror.

title: The Battery
description: Your phone battery has been at 1% for three days. It won't die, but strange apps keep installing themselves.

title: The Alibi
description: Police ask for your alibi for last night. You were home alone, but a stranger comes forward and says they were with you.

title: The Jury
description: You are on a jury. The defendant looks exactly like you.

title: The Confession
description: A priest hears a confession of a murder that hasn't happened yet. He sees the victim walking outside.
